title: Who is the better drummer, Charlie Watts or Mitch Mitchell? - Quora

response.answer_text: I guess if we're talking technically Mitch Mitchell would take the lead. But now you can set a metronome on while Charlie is playing, then check it every 10 minutes and Charlie will be right on with the machine. He's a strong rock, RB drummer. Solid.They're both incredible at their craft.

Mitchell was busy and imaginative. Watts is in the pocket and in the groove. Both were very well suited to the bands they play(ed) in. Both were light drummers who would swing rather than pound…the jazz background, y’know.
